column4: tried three different methods  (roxio, infarecorder and isorecorder) for creating an image for ubuntu 10.04 all end up creating what look to be blank disks. is there a problem wth the iso image?
You're trying to create an image, or burn the image to disc?
had no problems burning image of 8.10
are you using ubuntu now?   If so, you can use the startup disk creator to make a bootable usb flast drive from the iso image
